page.title: 03A Viewpoint and a View.
page.content:
{"So where shall we take it from?"
"Low flying pilots,birds and very rich photographers with telephoto lenses would have a better chance."
{"Yes good idea.Near Ugglebarnby there {is a view!Look at all the trafffic} {going up Bluebank,and you can see down {over the fields towards Littlebeck,and {even Sleights church.It is a pity the {sun isn't shining.My goodness isn't it {all far away!"
"Yes I said the north side of the Esk would be better.Looking south from Aislaby side you can see some of Sleights sloping up to the junction with Eskdaleside.Brackenhill housing estate and other Eskdaleside houses, the steep incline above to Sleights Moor,tree filled workings,farms,---"
